devdoc.author: Batis Abhari (https://github.com/baties - ContactMe: abhari_Batis@hotmail.com)
devdoc.details: MonthlyLottery will be Generated by LotteryGenerator in Next Version

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

planB_VRFDelay().details: Only If after 5 min the VRF Coordinator does not respond This function Change the lWinnerSelected to True so the Last Random Word used instead of a new one .

potInitialize().details: AtFirst each Monthly Pot must be Initialized.

potPause().details: THis Function just Pauses the current Pot Play and Select Winner Routines and Use only for Emergency .

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

select_Winner().details: Monthly Lottery Pot Winner Selection Start Process, This Function Just Called Request Random Number Routine For Communicate with VRF Coordinator.

select_Winner_Continue().details: Monthly Lottery Pot Winner Selection Continue, This Function Only Call after fulfillRandomWords is Called. This Function is responsible for Updating Lottery Data, Pay the Winner Prize & then clear and Release the Memory

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Monthly Lottery For BSC Lottery Game

getWeeklyWinnersArray().notice: Get the list of All Weekly Lottery Winners

planB_VRFDelay().notice: This Function is Only a PLan B for When The VRF Coordinator does not respond in a short time .

potPause().notice: Hourly Lottery Pot is Pausable, This is the Trigger.

select_Winner().notice: Monthly Lottery Pot Winner Selection, This Winner is Selected among Weekly Winner List.

select_Winner_Continue().notice: Monthly Lottery Pot Winner Selection Continue, This Function Selects The Winner With Random Number Generated.

userdoc.notice: This SmartContract is responsible for implimentation of Monthly Pot Lottery
